title: Discover the Power and Adventure of Cerro Negro
description: Embark on an exhilarating journey to Cerro Negro, Nicaragua—one of the youngest and most active volcanoes in Central America. Located in the department of León, this dramatic black cone offers an unforgettable blend of adventure, geological wonder, and breathtaking scenery.

Begin your experience at the base of Cerro Negro, where guides share the volcano’s explosive history, scientific significance, and the unique characteristics that distinguish it from other volcanoes in the region. Learn about its frequent eruptions, the formation of its dark volcanic sand, and the iconic landscapes that surround it.

Hike up the steep, ash-covered slopes to reach the crater rim. Along the way, witness panoramic views of the Maribios volcanic chain and the vast fields of lava and ash that tell the story of Cerro Negro’s powerful eruptions. At the summit, feel the heat rising from the active crater and explore the fascinating textures and colors of this living volcano.

For thrill-seekers, experience the world-famous volcano boarding descent—a once-in-a-lifetime adventure that lets you slide down the ashy slopes at exhilarating speeds. Whether you're drawn by adrenaline, the beauty of a volcanic landscape, or the science behind this geological marvel, Cerro Negro offers a truly unforgettable experience. Discover today the energy, mystery, and excitement of Cerro Negro in León.
